content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received an error message when trying to execute the shell command "feh output.png". The error message stated that "feh" was not found. I then sent a command to my computer to install "imagemagick" using the "execute_shell" command with the argument "sudo apt-get install -yq imagemagick". The execute_shell command returned that imagemagick is already installed. I then sent a command to display the output.png file using the "execute_shell" command with the argument "display output.png".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"display-im6.q16: unable to open X server `\' @ error/display.c/DisplayImageCommand/412.\\n"'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "cat output.png | imgcat"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: imgcat: not found\\ncat: output.png: No such file or directory\\n'"}]
